languages.text: {n}Паскаль, вознеся краткую двоичную молитву, вводит команду за командой, творя ловушку для духа машины, живущего в алтаре. Но Омниссия не благословляет его на убийство своего ангела, и техножрецу не удается ввести в заблуждение чуткого слугу Бога-Машины.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль, вознеся краткую двоичную молитву, вводит команду за командой, творя ловушку для духа машины, живущего в алтаре. Но Омниссия не благословляет его на убийство своего ангела, и техножрецу не удается ввести в заблуждение чуткого слугу Бога-машины.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. But the Omnissiah refuses to give His blessing for the killing of His angel, and the Tech-Priest fails to beguile the keen servant of the Machine God.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Паскаль, вознеся краткую двоичную молитву, вводит команду за командой, творя ловушку для духа машины, живущего в алтаре. Но Омниссия не благословляет его на убийство своего ангела, и техножрецу не удается ввести в заблуждение чуткого слугу Бога-Машины.{/n}

But Omnissiah refuses to give his blessing for the killing of his angel, and the Tech-Priest fails to beguile the keen servant of the Machine God.{/n}

{n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. But the Omnissiah refuses to give His blessing for the killing of His angel, and the Tech-Priest fails to beguile the keen servant of the Machine God.{/n}

{n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. But the Omnissiah refuses to give His blessing for the killing of His angel, and the Tech-Priest fails to beguile the keen servant of the Machine God.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal spricht ein kurzes Gebet in Binhärsprech, dann gibt er einen Befehl nach dem anderen ein, um dem Maschinengeist, der dem Altar innewohnt, eine Falle zu stellen. Doch der Omnissiah weigert sich, dem Mord an seinem Engel seinen Segen zu erteilen. Es gelingt dem Techpriester nicht, den eifrigen Diener des Maschinengotts zu überlisten.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. But the Omnissiah refuses to give His blessing for the killing of His angel, and the Tech-Priest fails to beguile the keen servant of the Machine God.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal spricht ein kurzes Gebet in Binhärsprech, dann gibt er einen Befehl nach dem anderen ein, um dem Maschinengeist, der dem Altar innewohnt, eine Falle zu stellen. Doch der Omnissiah weigert sich, dem Mord an seinem Engel seinen Segen zu erteilen. Es gelingt dem Techpriester nicht, den eifrigen Diener des Maschinengotts zu überlisten.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal récite une courte prière binhaire, avant de saisir les commandes pour mettre en place un piège visant à capturer l'esprit de la machine qui se trouve dans l'autel, mais l'Omnimessie refuse de donner sa bénédiction pour le meurtre de son ange, empêchant le technoprêtre de piéger le serviteur du Dieu-Machine.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. But the Omnissiah refuses to give His blessing for the killing of His angel, and the Tech-Priest fails to beguile the keen servant of the Machine God.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal récite une courte prière binhaire, avant de saisir les commandes pour mettre en place un piège visant à capturer l'esprit de la machine qui se trouve dans l'autel, mais l'Omnimessie refuse de donner sa bénédiction pour le meurtre de son ange, empêchant le technoprêtre de piéger le serviteur du Dieu-Machine.{/n}

languages.text: {n}帕斯卡简短地进行了二进制的祈祷，随后输入一个又一个命令，为居住在这座祭坛的机魂设下陷阱。然而，欧姆尼塞亚却拒绝庇佑杀害祂使者的行为。即便是技术神甫的陷阱，也未能引诱到万机之神敏锐的仆人。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. But the Omnissiah refuses to give His blessing for the killing of His angel, and the Tech-Priest fails to beguile the keen servant of the Machine God.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}帕斯卡简短地进行了二进制的祈祷，随后输入一个又一个命令，为居住在这座祭坛的机魂设下陷阱。然而，欧姆尼塞亚却拒绝庇佑杀害祂使者的行为。即便是技术祭司的陷阱，也未能引诱到万机之神敏锐的仆人。{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは短く2進数の祈りを捧げ、次から次へとコマンドを入力し、祭壇に宿る機械精霊にかける罠の設定を試みる。しかし万機神が自らの天使を殺すための祝福を与えることを拒んだため、技術司祭は機械神の熱心な従者を罠に嵌めることができなかった。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. But the Omnissiah refuses to give His blessing for the killing of His angel, and the Tech-Priest fails to beguile the keen servant of the Machine God.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは短く、2進数の祈りを捧げ、次から次へとコマンドを入力し、祭壇に宿る機械精霊にかける罠の設定を試みる。しかし、万機神は自らの天使を殺すために祝福を与えることを拒んで、技術司祭は機械神の熱心な従者を罠に嵌めることができなかった。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal ofrece una breve oración binaria y, a continuación, introduce una orden tras otra para tender una trampa al espíritu máquina que habita en el altar. Pero el Omnissiah se niega a dar su bendición a la muerte de su ángel, y el Tecnosacerdote no logra engañar al astuto siervo del Dios Máquina.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. But the Omnissiah refuses to give His blessing for the killing of His angel, and the Tech-Priest fails to beguile the keen servant of the Machine God.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal ofrece una breve oración binaria y, a continuación, introduce una orden tras otra para tender una trampa al espíritu máquina que habita en el altar. Pero el Omnissiah se niega a dar su bendición a la muerte de su ángel, y el Tecnosacerdote no logra engañar al astuto siervo del Dios Máquina.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal kısa bir ikilidil dua okuyor ve sunakta ikamet eden makine ruhunu tuzağa düşürebilmek için komut üstüne komut giriyor. Ancak Hermesih, meleğinin katledilmesine rıza göstermiyor. Dolayısıyla Tekno Rahip, Makine Tanrı'nın zeki hizmetkârını kandıramıyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal offers a short binharic prayer, then enters command after command to set up a trap for the machine spirit inhabiting the altar. But the Omnissiah refuses to give His blessing for the killing of His angel, and the Tech-Priest fails to beguile the keen servant of the Machine God.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal kısa bir ikilidil dua okuyor ve sunakta ikamet eden makine ruhunu tuzağa düşürebilmek için komutlara hızla basıyor. Ancak Hermesih, meleğinin katledilmesine rıza göstermiyor. Dolayısıyla Tekno Rahip, Makine Tanrı'nın sevgili hizmetkârını baştan çıkaramıyor.{/n}
